about_the_game:
You are locked at home, eagerly anticipating the moment to step outside again.
Only it's....
.
.
.
.
...taking really long.

In this tiny world filled with surprising interactions awaiting to be discovered, you must find ways to pass the time by engaging with various activities around the house, as you deal with the only company you have in this adventure: yourself.

AS THE CLOCK TICKS AWAY...


  • Deal with the slow passage of time in a short, visually striking adventure developed by musician and game designer Gools
  • Explore the confines of your home and reach up to four different endings.
  • Experience a unique soundtrack composed by artists from Recife, Brazil.
  • Find and take part in a variety of activities around the house to make time pass!
  • Try your hand at poetry... and send it to us! Or keep it to yourself, it's your choice!
  • Play an instrument. Maybe get better at it?
  • Explore your bedroom, take a nap, make a snack...
  • ...AND ENTER THE REALMS OF YOUR OWN THOUGHTS.

name: Century of Anticipation Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Locked away at home, time slows to a crawl, your only company is yourself. In this short adventure, your challenge might be the toughest of all: make time pass again!
